featured.title: Pigshell
featured.description: Pigshell is an innovative image/video filter app powered by React, Javascript, and CSS. Experience the magic of converting images and live videos into captivating pixel-based media using Canvas functions. With user accounts and secure authentication via Firebase, Firestore, and Redux, users can seamlessly access their media from multiple devices, ensuring a personalized and connected creative experience.

featured.title: Typr Next
featured.description: Typr Next: Bored of the old way of practicing typing with Random Words, this is the next Generation Typing Practice Website for everyone. Practice with real paragraphs and jokes.

projects.title: HypeDB
projects.description: HypeDB: A powerful NoSQL database built with NodeJS, Streams, and File Compression for high-performance data handling. Features secure fields, schema design, and NodeJS database driver.

projects.title: MovieFling
projects.description: MovieFling: A React-based app for effortless movie and TV series discovery. Access vast TMDB data with custom pages for each title. Unique feature: Find watch providers based on your country for seamless streaming.

projects.title: Souvik Talks
projects.description: Souvik Talks is a personal blogging website built as a freelancing contract. It uses ReactJS and Firebase to provide a smooth reading and writing experience with built in authentication.

projects.title: Typr
projects.description: Typr: A minimalist aproach to become better at typing, it follows a Neomorphic design to provide a real life keyboard simulation.

projects.title: Waltz
projects.description: Weatherly: A simple, yet powerful wallpaper provider Flutter app that uses the Pexels API to generate themed wallpapers

projects.title: Spaceslounge
projects.description: An open source Lounge for Tweeters to hangout and chill. Built using NextJS and Tailwind. I have been contributing to this project.

projects.description: A decentralized Crypto exchange app that let's users exchange Memes ðŸ˜‚ and Crypto.

projects.title: Emoji Card Game
projects.description: Emoji guessing card matching game, made using vanilla JavaScript, lots of css animations and the native HTML drag and drop API

projects.title: Pawd
projects.description: A powerfull Notetaking app built using Flutter and Firebase for authentication. It has features like adding and viewing your tasks and a focus timer.

projects.title: DSA Javascript
projects.description: JavaScript based solutions for the DSA Sheet Questions by Love Babbar and Leetcode

projects.title: jQuery Clone
projects.description: A small jQuery clone that packs the essentials and everyday functions from the famous and obsolete jQuery library.

projects.title: Chatter
projects.description: A simple chatting app that uses WebSockets to smoothly create rooms and chat.
